employee, keeps on working

Politics

Stocks tumble as 'fiscal cliff' deadline nears

Stocks fell for a fifth day on concern that Washington lawmakers will fail to reach a budget deal before a self-imposed year-end deadline. The five-day for the Dow Jones industrial average was the longest since July.
